root.name: Tiki Magic Mini Golf
root.description: GeneralTiki Magic Minigolf is a put put style mini golf game developed and published by Freeverse. The game hasÂ it's own peculiar style with Mayan as well as Hawaiian themes mixed together to create a unique golf experience. At the beginning of the game, the player can choose from one of three golf course (grasslands, waterlands and volcano) and then choose a mask. This mask will then be hovering over the golf ball during the players turn, and depending on the character of the mask make different expressions and say different things.
